txt.en: Wanted: Broken wooden maces found on the Orcs besieging Trestlebridge to the north and east. Deliver the items to Guardsman Otley in the town of Trestlebridge.
'We'll drive these Orcs away from our land and take back all the North Downs. These maces are proof that we'll be able to do so. Thank you.'

'You can find Orcs north and east of the town. You may even see them within the boundary of the town when they attack in force. Get their maces so we can start to burgeon the spirits of the townsfolk.'
DNT HIDING CONTENT - Task: Broken Wooden Maces
Guardsman Otley, in Trestlebridge, is awaiting delivery of broken wooden maces at the war-torn town of Trestlebridge.
Deliver the broken wooden maces to Guardsman Otley at Trestlebridge
